attributes.action: Add third party car insurance to the petrol price to make every car driver covered
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A government provided scheme to ensure that all car drivers have the minimum car insurance cover.

There would be no escape from this, as anybody buying petrol would be automatically covered.

people who require more than third party cover, could purchase extra cover for their car as they do at present.
